recent_updates.summary: Documented toolkit runtime helpers in docs/toolkit-runtime.md and refreshed architecture/authoring references.

Enabled ${VAR} interpolation in the dotenv parser so bootstrap-stack.sh can derive DATABASE_URL credentials from POSTGRES_* once, and refactored Vault status parsing to avoid JSONDecodeError when probing docker exec output.
Added a python-backed dotenv parser with pytest coverage and taught bootstrap-stack.sh to load .env values containing spaces safely.

Treat GitHub raw manifests as catalog descriptors, prefer github.io bundle URLs, auto-try '.zip' variants, guard against HTML responses with zip signature checks, fall back to manifest paths, and harden bundle writes against cross-device rename errors with regression coverage.
Implemented community catalog fetch/install endpoints, introduced toolbox settings (catalog/auth tabs), refactored admin toolkits layout, and refreshed documentation.
Implemented formatApiError helper with Vitest coverage and updated the API Checker UI to surface clearer failure messaging.
Added a bootstrap preflight that validates Postgres credentials and refreshed onboarding docs to require unique values.
Reworked Probe Designer into a two-column workflow with catalog filtering, inline edit, and clone actions backed by new helper tests.
Bootstrapped community toolkit repository scaffold and produced toolkit-community-repo.zip artifact.
Added paginated Job Logs view to Latency Sleuth with a reusable hook and Vitest coverage.
Automated docker-compose and Vault bootstrap with bootstrap-stack.sh and refreshed operator docs.
Moved the response viewer into a dedicated right column with a collapsible history panel and responsive fallback.
Authored Toolbox architecture and schema references for Codex and updated prompts to consume them.
Enforced non-default JWT secrets with startup validation and refreshed operator docs.

notes: Initialised by Codex; update this file whenever focus or status changes. Architecture/schema references refreshed in session 2.
